Jark

blog code group

why jark
start
namespace
packages
classpath
docs
editors
scripting
vm
resources
wishlist
git log
 A tool to manage classpaths and clojure namespaces on a persistent JVM

Todo & wishlist

  • Integrate nrepl. Use that as the communication protocol
  • Currently works only on GNU/Linux, someday port it to windows.
  • Support Vim
  • Have a ~/.jarkrc file that has sections corresponding to named-connections

 [a]
 host   = 192.168.1.2
 port   = 2113
 init   = swank start, vim start


 [b]
 host  = 192.168.1.3
 port  = 2114
 init  = h2.db load

jark vm connect --name a 
<do something>, and then
jark vm connect --name b

If you have an issue, just add it here on github issue tracker
